title: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine producer
notes: An impressive series about the transformation of an ordinary man into a criminal.

title: Stranger Things
description: A group of kids uncovering supernatural mysteries in their town
notes: A perfect blend of 80s nostalgia and science fiction.

title: The Walking Dead
description: Survivors of a zombie apocalypse fight to stay alive
notes: An intense series about survival in a post-apocalyptic world.

title: Game of Thrones
description: Noble families vie for control of the Iron Throne
notes: An epic tale of power, betrayal, and war.

title: American Horror Story
description: An anthology series centering on different characters and locations, including a haunted house, an insane asylum, and a witch coven.
notes: A chilling anthology series with a new story each season.

title: Black Mirror
description: An anthology series exploring a twisted high-tech world
notes: A dark reflection on technology and society.

title: Dark
description: A family saga with a supernatural twist, set in a German town
notes: A complex time-travel narrative that spans generations.

title: The Boys
description: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes
notes: A dark take on superhero culture.

title: The Crown
description: A historical drama about the reign of Queen Elizabeth II
notes: A fascinating look at the British monarchy.

title: The Mandalorian
description: A lone bounty hunter makes his way through the outer reaches of the galaxy
notes: A space western set in the Star Wars universe.

title: The Witcher
description: A monster hunter struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts
notes: Based on the popular book series.

title: Westworld
description: A dark odyssey about the dawn of artificial consciousness
notes: A complex narrative about consciousness and free will.
